connectionTimeout: Connection Timeout: Unable to connect to the server. Please try again later.
sendTimeout: Send Timeout: Request timed out while sending data. Please check your connection and try again.
receiveTimeout: Receive Timeout: Server took too long to respond. Please try again later.
badRequest: Bad Request: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.
unauthorized: Unauthorized: Access is denied due to invalid credentials.
forbidden: Forbidden: You do not have the necessary permissions to access this resource.
notFound: Not Found: The requested resource could not be found on the server.
conflict: Conflict: There was a conflict with the current state of the resource.
internalServerError: Internal Server Error: The server encountered an error and could not complete your request.
serverError: Server Error: An unexpected error occurred while processing your request.
cancel: Request Canceled: The request was canceled before completion.
unknown: Network Error: No internet connection. Please check your network settings.
badCertificate: Security Error: The SSL/TLS certificate is invalid.
connectionError: Connection Error: There was a problem connecting to the server. Please try again.
unexpectedError: Unexpected Error: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
noInternet: No internet connection. Please check your network settings and try again.
